languages.text: {n}Вы слышите скрип сжимаемых на рукоятях клинков перчаток — верный знак, что Маражай не просто в гневе, а в едва сдерживаемой ярости.{/n}
{n}You hear the creaking of gloves as Marazhai's hands clutch his blade grips, a telltale sign that he is not merely annoyed but beside himself with fury.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы слышите скрип сжимаемых на рукоятях клинков перчаток — верный знак, что Маражай не просто в гневе, а в едва сдерживаемой ярости.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You hear creaking of the gloves as Marazhai's hands clutch the blade grips, a telltale sign that he is not merely annoyed but is beyond himself with fury.{/n}
{n}You hear creaking of the gloves as Marazhai's hands clutch the blade grips, a telltale sign that he is not merely annoyed but is beyond himself with fury.{/n}

{n}You hear the creaking of gloves as Marazhai's hands clutch his blade grips, a telltale sign that he is not merely annoyed but beside himself with fury.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hörst das Knarzen von Handschuhen, als Marazhai seine Klingen umfasst. Ein klares Zeichen, dass er nicht nur verärgert, sondern außer sich vor Zorn ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the creaking of gloves as Marazhai's hands clutch his blade grips, a telltale sign that he is not merely annoyed but beside himself with fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst das Knarzen von Handschuhen, als Marazhai seine Klingen umfasst. Ein klares Zeichen, dass er nicht nur verärgert, sondern außer sich vor Zorn ist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋握紧了刀柄，你听到他的铁手套传来了咯吱声。这是个明显的迹象，表明他已经不仅仅是发了火，而且快要气疯了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the creaking of gloves as Marazhai's hands clutch his blade grips, a telltale sign that he is not merely annoyed but beside himself with fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋握紧了刀柄，你听到他的铁手套传来了咯吱声。这是个明显的迹象，表明他已经不仅仅是发了火，而且快要气疯了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les gants de Marazhai crissent alors qu'il saisit les poignées de ses lames : il n'est pas simplement irrité, mais fou de rage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the creaking of gloves as Marazhai's hands clutch his blade grips, a telltale sign that he is not merely annoyed but beside himself with fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les gants de Marazhai crissent alors qu'il saisit les poignées de ses lames : il n'est pas simplement irrité, mais fou de rage.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Oyes el crujido de guantes cuando Marazhai estruja las empuñaduras de sus espadas, señal de que no está irritado sino furioso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the creaking of gloves as Marazhai's hands clutch his blade grips, a telltale sign that he is not merely annoyed but beside himself with fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Oyes el crujido de guantes cuando Marazhai estruja las empuñaduras de sus espadas, señal de que no está irritado sino furioso.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの剣を握る手に力が入るとグラブの軋む音が聞こえる。それは彼が単にイラついているだけでなく怒りで我を忘れているという、隠しきれないサインである。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the creaking of gloves as Marazhai's hands clutch his blade grips, a telltale sign that he is not merely annoyed but beside himself with fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの剣を握る手に力が入るとグラブの軋む音が聞こえる。それは彼が単にイラついているだけでなく怒りで我を忘れているという、隠しきれないサインである。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın kılıcını kavrayan elindeki eldivenin gıcırtısını duyabiliyorsun. Yalnızca rahatsız olmakla kalmadığının, bilakis öfkeyle köpürdüğünün bir göstergesi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear the creaking of gloves as Marazhai's hands clutch his blade grips, a telltale sign that he is not merely annoyed but beside himself with fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın kılıcını kavrayan elindeki eldivenin gıcırtısını duyabiliyorsun. Yalnızca rahatsız olmakla kalmadığının, bilakis öfkeyle köpürdüğünün bir göstergesi.{/n}
